sourcesContent:
import { all, call } from 'redux-saga/effects'
import { shopSaga } from './shop/shop.sagas'
import { userSagas } from './user/user.saga'
import { cartSaga } from './cart/cart.saga'
export default function* rootSaga() {
yield all([
    call(shopSaga), 
    call(userSagas),
    call(cartSaga)
])
}
